H0.text: Meters is the best unit to measure the mass of the fertilizer used by students investigating the effects of different fertilizers on plant growth.

H1.text: Centimeters are the best units to measure the mass of the fertilizer used by students investigating the effects of different fertilizers on plant growth.

H2.text: Grams are the best units to measure the mass of the fertilizer used when students investigate the effects of different fertilizers on plant growth.

H3.text: Milligrams are the best units to measure the mass of the fertilizer used by students investigating the effects of different fertilizers on plant growth.

A4.text: The gram is the most widely used unit of measurement for nonâ€‘liquid ingredients in cooking and grocery shopping worldwide.

A5.text: The gram is a unit of mass in the International System of Units (SI) equal to one thousandth of a kilogram.
